title: Citicorp Center 8 - They Are Here to Stay Saint Peter's Church, CIticorp Center
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: Photographic reproduction of a view up through clouds to blue sky with a stylized maze modeled on a Greek Orthodox Cross in black suspended at center.  Blue at upper right quadrant, with white covering the remainder of the sheet.In gray, lower left on edge: the number 8. Three paragraphs of text in gray at lower left. In blue at lower right in block letters: SAINT / PETER'S / CHURCH and in light blue below: CITICORP / CENTER. Blue and white banding along lower edge of sheet.
name: Poster
